RawLine: ITEM_05134_Tip,製藥藥材，清虛熱、除濕火，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成難度：{color=#ff0000}9{/color}。,制药药材，清虚热、除湿火，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成难度：{color=#ff0000}9{/color}。

Items.r: 製藥藥材，清虛熱、除濕火，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成難度：{color=#ff0000}9{/color}。
Items.c: 製藥藥材,清虛熱、除濕火,味苦,性寒。合成難度：9。
Items.mt: An herb used in the manufacture of medicine to clear deficiency heat and remove dampness and fire, bitter in taste and cold in nature. Synthesis difficulty: 9.

Items.r: 制药药材，清虚热、除湿火，味苦，性寒。{p}{p}合成难度：{color=#ff0000}9{/color}。
